alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 05 at 2:05AM MST until February 06 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern Laramie Range, adjacent Foothills, and central Laramie County including the city of Cheyenne. * WHEN...11 PM MST this evening until 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
